actions.name: Curse
actions.description: Effect: The user gains +1 ATK and DEF Stage and -1 SPD Stage for 5 Activations.

actions.name: Curse (Ghost)

cost.trigger: The user possesses the [Ghost] Type and has more than 50% of its HP remaining.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user possesses the [Ghost] Type and has more than 50% of its HP remaining.

Effect: The user sacrifices HP equal to 50% of their Max HP. The targeted creature is @Affliction[cursed] 6.

If the user is not a Ghost-typed creature, they raise their ATK Stage and DEF by +1 and reduce their SPD Stage by -1 for 5 Activations instead.
